SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Animal
Animal class is an abstract class that represents entities classified as animals, and it is composed of game components of Fiery Dragons game.
AnimalFactory
A factory class to manufacture all the game components comprising animals including volcano cards, chit cards and caves.
BabyDragon
A class representing BabyDragon, which is one of Animal, is composed of game components of Fiery Dragons game.
Bat
A class representing Bat, which is one of Animal, is composed of game components of Fiery Dragons game.
Bear
A class representing Bear, which is one of Animal, is composed of game components of Fiery Dragons game.
BoardSetup
BoardSetup class extends JPanel to set up the board layout for the game.
CaveCard
CaveCard class is one of the GameComponent of Fiery Dragons game.
CaveCardDeserializer
 
CaveCardManager
CaveCardManager is a manager class to manage the CaveCard's setup.
CaveCardSerializer
 
Chance
A Chance class is a class that applied any chance effects to the player's dragon tokens when the player flip on it.
ChitBoard
ChitBoard is a class that handle the initialisation of Animal for ChitCard's instance.
ChitCard
ChitCard class is one of the GameComponent of Fiery Dragons game.
ChitCardManager
ChitCardManager is a manager class to manage the ChitCard's setup.
DecisionPanel
DecisionPanel class is a panel that extends JOptionPane to render the options for the current player to decide whether they want to continue the current turn.
Display
A Display class is to set new font's display for the UI of Fiery Dragons.
ExitButton
A ExitButton class represents a button for player to exit the Fiery Dragon Game.
Game
The Game class represents the main logic and user interface for the Fiery Dragons game.
GameComponent
GameComponent class is an abstract class that represents all the game components of Fiery Dragons game.
GameState
GameState is a manager class to manage the saving and loading of the current game state.
HomePage
The HomePage class is to display for players to start the Fiery Dragons game.
InfoButton
A InfoButton class represents a button for player to click and show the game rules of Fiery Dragons game.
Main
The Main class serves as the entry point for the Fiery Dragons game application.
MovementManager
 
Music
The Music class is to get music file as background music of Fiery Dragon Game.
MusicButton
A MusicButton class represents a button for player to mute or on the sound.
PirateDragon
A class representing PirateDragon, which is one of Animal, is composed of game components of Fiery Dragons game.
Player
The Player class represents a player in the game.
PlayerInfoDialog
The PlayerInfoDialog class is to display for players to start the Fiery Dragons game.
Salamander
A class representing Salamander, which is one of Animal, is composed of game components of Fiery Dragons game.
SavingPanel
SavingPanel class is a panel to render the saving option for the current player to choose whether they want to save the current progress or not.
Spider
A class representing Spider, which is one of Animal, is composed of game components of Fiery Dragons game.
Token
This is a Token class representing the player in the game.
TokenDeserializer
 
TokenSerializer
 
VolcanoCard
VolcanoCard class represents volcano cards' tiles which is one of the GameComponent of Fiery Dragons game.
VolcanoCardBoard
VolcanoCardBoard is a class that handle the initialisation of Animal for VolcanoGroup's instances.
VolcanoCardManager
VolcanoCardManager is a manager class to manage the volcano cards' VolcanoGroup setup.
VolcanoGroup
VolcanoGroup is a class which represents volcano cards which is one of the GameComponent of Fiery Dragons game.
WinningPopupPanel
WinningPopupPanel class is a panel to render the winning condition when the player's token successfully reaches its cave.
